metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0193 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
WebSocket08FrameDecoder in Netty 3.6.x before 3.6.9, 3.7.x before 3.7.1, 3.8.x before 3.8.2, 3.9.x before 3.9.1, and 4.0.x before 4.0.19 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a TextWebSocketFrame followed by a long stream of ContinuationWebSocketFrames.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnetty-java - 1:4.0.34-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netty package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.0.34-1').
